name: Hasso
description: 88 pts Robert Parker - A pale yellow wine with a green hue. It has a fresh and crisp nose demonstrating its youthful character, with predominantly citrus and green apple aromas and good minerality. Its fresh acidity, light and well-balanced body with its fruit and alcohol content lend it a lively and prolonged finish.

name: Rioja Reserva
description: A classic Rioja Reserva with a deep ruby color. Aromas of ripe black fruit, vanilla, and spices. Smooth and balanced on the palate with well-integrated tannins and a long, elegant finish.

name: Ch√¢teau Margaux
description: An iconic Bordeaux wine with a deep garnet color. Complex aromas of blackcurrant, cedar, and tobacco. Full-bodied with velvety tannins and a long, lingering finish.

name: Prosecco Superiore
description: A premium Prosecco with fine bubbles and a straw yellow color. Delicate aromas of white flowers and citrus. Crisp and refreshing on the palate with a lively effervescence.

name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A bold Cabernet Sauvignon with a deep purple color. Intense aromas of blackberry, cassis, and oak. Rich and full-bodied with firm tannins and a long, velvety finish.

name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A bold Cabernet Sauvignon with a deep purple color. Intense aromas of blackberry, cassis, and oak. Rich and full-bodied with firm tannins and a long, velvety finish.
